items.headline: Is there such a thing as too much Taylor Swift? Not for Disney.
items.summary_en: There is no sign yet of Taylor Swift fatigue, as a docuseries on Swift’s “The Eras Tour” is set to be released on Disney+ in December, just months after her latest album was released.

items.headline: Amazon and TikTok are helping Estee Lauder reinvent itself, Goldman Sachs says
items.summary_en: Cosmetics giant Estee Lauder Cos.’s rebound could take hold sooner than expected, Goldman Sachs analysts said on Monday, as trends firm up in the U.S. and China and the company puts more focus on newer and higher-end products and sales through TikTok and Amazon.
